attributes.action: Take the voice of the Ordinary Citizens of the UK to the United Nations and let it be made known that we, the ordinary people of our Country, abhor the wanton killing by Israel, of innocent men, women and children in Gaza.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The United Nations must excercise it's full Humanitarian Powers in a bid to stop this slaughter. The People of the World Community demand that the Leaders of the World put a stop to this madness now and proceed to get every possible aid into Gaza by SHARING whatever excesses we in the West have with these now dispossessed people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
